CatDescriptText: Mr. E.F. Horns, Jeannette, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 15, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Should a woman, who has passed the age of 45, marry for the first time?" answer reads: "Definitely, if she finds the proper soulmate. There is no age limit on marriage."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of E. F. Horn wearing herringbone coat, hat, and light colored scarf, standing with hands in pockets in front of marble wall with store window on left
